Description:
JOB PURPOSE:  
Supervise and conduct the maintenance activities for Firefighting and dewatering systems.RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES:
•    Supervise, coordinate, and control all maintenance activities.
•    Monitoring preventive and corrective maintenance activities for Electromechanical systems.
•    Supervise & execute all mechanical maintenance tasks. 
•    Supervise & execute all electrical maintenance tasks.
•    Maintenance of motor control circuits and process controls.
•    Work on electrical system up to 480 VAC.
•    Utilize the root cause analysis to investigate breakdown of the failures.
•    Inspects operating equipments for conformance with operational and safety performance. 
•    Observe and test the operation of equipments to diagnose malfunctions, using testing devices. 
•    Conduct preventative and corrective maintenance for submersible and dry pumps.
•    Conduct preventative and corrective maintenance work firefighting systems (FM200, CO2, Foam system, Sprinklers, Pumps, Co2 ...)
•    Conduct periodic Inspect for fire extinguishers. 
•    To ensure all the field activities are carried out as per Safety standards.ESSENTIAL QUALIFICATIONS, KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCE 
QUALIFICATIONS: 
•    Diploma/ or a suitable relevant degree.
KNOWLEDGE: 
•    Had good experience in maintenance process either mechanical or electrical.
•    Strong knowledge of maintenance of firefighting systems.
•    Had good experience in maintenance of submersible pumps. 
EXPERIENCE: 
•    10 years of experience in maintenance of pumps and firefighting systems.
•    5 years of experience in maintenance of metro stations (Preferred).DESIRED BEHAVIORS: 
•    Ability to communicate with staff.
•    Teamwork 
•    Good listener.
•    Had the ability to learn new techniques. 
•    Problem solving abilityJob Details
